about_the_game:
Did you love bobbing your head along to the tunes while getting your soul crushed in ROOT? Well now you can bob along with those very tunes getting your soul crushed on your way to work, on a lonely weekend, or wherever you please because the ROOT OST is out now! No longer do you have to cower in the glowing corners of highly protected servers to hear the tunes that you loved so much. Now you can cower in the corner of your real room while you listen to this 17 track (and two bonus tracks) album packed full with your favorite sing along tracks from ROOT.

Tracklist (MP3 Format):

1. Boone
2. Summerton
3. Cave Child
4. DHCP
5. Heart of Wires
6. Backtrack
7. Falling
8. Down to Drown (Root Mix)
9. BLΔCK ICE (Root Mix)
10. Fallacy
11. Suspense_01
12. A Time For Pause
13. Catwalk
14. Data Stream
15. Shroud
16. Constantine (Root Mix)
17. Delve
18. BLΔCK ICE (Original Mix)
19. Constantine (Original Mix)

Songs will be placed in your ROOT folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\ROOT\ROOT Soundtrack

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 and Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.1 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 512MB or equivalent

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.8.5 and above
  • Processor: 2.5GHz Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 512MB or equivalent
